alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Burke, southeastern Richmond, west central Barnwell and southwestern Aiken Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jackson, or 9 miles west of Savannah River Site, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Savannah River Site, Aiken Mall, New Ellenton, Jackson, Shell Bluff, Shell Bluff Landing, Boyd Pond Park, Audubon`s Silver Bluff Sanctuary, Savannah River Site Badge Office, Savannah River Site H Canyon and Bennock Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
